snippet: The potential arrival of F-35 jets to replace the Air National Guard’s aging F-16 fleet has angered residents who say the jets’ noise is a danger to the quality of life.
abstract: Potential arrival at Burlington, Vt, airport of louder, new F-35 fighter jets to replace the Air National Guard’s aging F-16 fleet angers some residents who say the jets’ noise is a danger to their quality of life; supporters say F-35s will ensure the base's presence long into the future, and will cement Vermont's role in securing nation's airspace.
lead_paragraph: The potential arrival of F-35 jets to replace the Air National Guard’s aging F-16 fleet has angered residents who say the jets’ noise is a danger to the quality of life.

headline.main: Battle Over Fighter Jets in Vermont Heats Up
headline.print_headline: Battle on the Ground Heats Up Over Fighter Jets in Vermont
